title: Dictyophorus
text:
Dictyophorus is the type genus of <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a>s in the tribe <a href="Dictyophorini">Dictyophorini</a>, of the family <a href="Pyrgomorphidae">Pyrgomorphidae</a>; it is native to <a href="sub-Saharan%20Africa">sub-Saharan Africa</a>. The genus was named by <a href="Carl%20Peter%20Thunberg">Carl Peter Thunberg</a> in 1815.
Species.
These species belong to the genus "Dictyophorus":
